fact.description: The first-half is now underway.
Italy to take a throw-in in England territory.
Ball goes out of play for a England goal kick.
Italy awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as England is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Italy have a dangerous throw-in.
In Manaus England attack through Raheem Sterling. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Italy at Arena Amazonia.
Throw-in for England close to the penalty box.
Jordan Henderson gets his shot on target but fails to score for England.
Italy's Giorgio Chiellini gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Bjorn Kuipers awards England a goal kick.
England's Danny Welbeck breaks free at Arena Amazonia. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Italy have a goal kick.
Free kick Italy.
Bjorn Kuipers signals a free kick to England in their own half.
England awarded a free kick in their own half.
England are pushing forward but Glen Johnson's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Italy goal kick.
Bjorn Kuipers signals a free kick to England.
Bjorn Kuipers signals a free kick to Italy.
Italy drive forward and Antonio Candreva gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Italy awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Italy's Mario Balotelli misses with an attempt on goal.
England have a goal kick.
Important block from the Italy defence as Danny Welbeck fires in a strike for England.
England have been awarded a corner by Bjorn Kuipers.
Corner awarded to England.
Can Italy get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in England's half?
Bjorn Kuipers signals a free kick to England in their own half.
Bjorn Kuipers signals a Italy throw-in in England's half.
Can Italy get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in England's half?
Throw-in for England at Arena Amazonia.
Antonio Candreva for Italy gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for England at Arena Amazonia.
Bjorn Kuipers signals a England throw-in in Italy's half.
Throw-in for England in their own half.
Free kick England.
Bjorn Kuipers signals a free kick to Italy in their own half.
Free kick England.
England push forward through Steven Gerrard, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in Italy.
Italy have been awarded a corner by Bjorn Kuipers.
That's a fine assist from Antonio Candreva.
Bjorn Kuipers awards Italy a goal kick.
Great play from Wayne Rooney to set up the goal.
Antonio Candreva for Italy is whistled offside.
Jordan Henderson (England) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Ball safe as Italy is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Italy's Matteo Darmian breaks free at Arena Amazonia. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Bjorn Kuipers awards England a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Italy.
Antonio Candreva (Italy) fires in a shot – and hits the post!
Bjorn Kuipers blows to end the first-half.
Italy needs to be cautious. England have an attacking throw-in.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the first half.
In Manaus, Mario Balotelli of Italy is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
England to take a throw-in in Italy territory.
Can England get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Italy's half?
Italy drive forward but Mario Balotelli is judged offside.
Ball goes out of play for a Italy goal kick.
Danny Welbeck of England smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to England.
Antonio Candreva instrumental with a fine assist.
Italy's Mario Balotelli has run offside.
Wayne Rooney of England gets in a strike, but is off target.
Italy have a goal kick.
Bjorn Kuipers signals a England throw-in in Italy's half.
Raheem Sterling (England) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Goal kick for Italy at Arena Amazonia.
England have been awarded a corner by Bjorn Kuipers.
Thiago Motta is on a sub for Marco Verratti for Italy.
Italy awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Manaus Italy's Mario Balotelli is caught offside.
England awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Italy goal kick.
England are coming forward and Daniel Sturridge gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Bjorn Kuipers awards Italy a goal kick.
Roy Hodgson (England) is making a first substitution, with Ross Barkley replacing Danny Welbeck.
England's Wayne Rooney misses with an attempt on goal.
Italy have a goal kick.
England to take a throw-in in Italy territory.
Thiago Motta (Italy) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
England's Ross Barkley gets in a shot on goal at Arena Amazonia. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Bjorn Kuipers waits before resuming play because Raheem Sterling for England is still down.
Play has been resumed at Arena Amazonia.
England's Raheem Sterling looks ok and returns to the pitch.
England have been awarded a corner by Bjorn Kuipers.
Antonio Candreva of Italy gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for England at Arena Amazonia.
Bjorn Kuipers signals a free kick to Italy in their own half.
Corner awarded to England.
England have been awarded a corner by Bjorn Kuipers.
England are coming forward and Glen Johnson gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Italy at Arena Amazonia.
Cesare Prandelli is making the team's second substitution at Arena Amazonia with Ciro Immobile replacing Mario Balotelli.
Jack Wilshere is replacing Jordan Henderson for England at Arena Amazonia.
Bjorn Kuipers signals a free kick to England.
Bjorn Kuipers awards Italy a goal kick.
In Manaus England drive forward through Leighton Baines. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to England.
Can Italy get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in England's half?
Cesare Prandelli is making the team's third substitution at Arena Amazonia with Marco Parolo replacing Antonio Candreva.
Adam Lallana is replacing Daniel Sturridge for England at Arena Amazonia.
Ball goes out of play for a Italy goal kick.
Can England capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Italy's half?
Throw-in for Italy at Arena Amazonia.
England to take a throw-in in Italy territory.
Italy have a goal kick.
England awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bjorn Kuipers signals a free kick to England.
In Manaus England attack through Steven Gerrard. The finish is off target, however.
Bjorn Kuipers blows against Italy's Ciro Immobile for offside.
Ciro Immobile of Italy is pulled up for offside.
England are pushing forward but Wayne Rooney's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Italy at Arena Amazonia.
Bjorn Kuipers signals a England throw-in in Italy's half.
England's Adam Lallana gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Italy defender.
England have been awarded a corner by Bjorn Kuipers.
England's Raheem Sterling gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Bjorn Kuipers awards Italy a goal kick.
5 minutes will be added to the second half.
Ciro Immobile for Italy is whistled offside.
Bjorn Kuipers signals a throw-in for England, close to Italy's area.
Free kick Italy.
Raheem Sterling (England) has received a first yellow card.
Free kick Italy.
Italy apply pressure and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Andrea Pirlo. But the ball crashes against the crossbar!
Ball goes out of play for a England goal kick.
England have a dangerous throw-in.
Bjorn Kuipers blows to end the match. The final score is 1-2.
